attributes.action: Allow golf courses to reopen (with restrictions)
attributes.additional_details: We want the government to change its decision and allow golf courses across the UK to reopen. This is because people rely on these facilities to get some fresh air & exercise. Shutting golf courses limits opportunities to exercise which could affect people’s mental and physical wellbeing.
attributes.background: The goal is to get the government to rethink their decision to close golf courses and to come to an agreement to reopen them. As myself and many people rely on golf as part of general exercise or a source of happiness I think it would be beneficial for all to reopen them.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced that golf courses in England can re-open. 

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
